Title: Relates to renaming the state aid for certain independent institutions of higher learning to the Leonard P. Stavisky student success grants
Summary: Renames the state aid for certain independent institutions of higher learning to the Leonard P. Stavisky student success grants; requires certain institutions and colleges to submit a report on the use of the state aid apportionment received including how it supported student success.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to renaming the state aid for certain independent institutions of higher learning to the Leonard P. Stavisky student success grants
